subject: How can I test an Exception
msgSnippet: Hi,all : I am a frech man of Junit, and I have a question. How can I test a case which I want it throws an exception. How can I test the Exception is the one I
messageBody:
Hi,all :
I am a frech man of Junit, and I have a question.
How can I test a case which I want it throws an exception.

How can I test the Exception is the one I expected.

thanks
